Package it.polimi.is23am10.server.controller

Class ServerControllerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.server.controller.ServerControllerState
public final class ServerControllerState extends Object
The server controller state class definition. This should be a singleton-like instance owning the server current state.

      public static final void addGameHandler(GameHandler handler) throws NullGameHandlerInstance
      Add a new game handler to the pool.
      Parameters:
      handler - The game handler instance to add.
      Throws:
      NullGameHandlerInstance - If the game handler is null. On null game handler.

    • removeGameHandlerById

      public static final void removeGameHandlerById(UUID id)
      Remove a game handler from the pool. This performs all the clients disconnections.
      Parameters:
      id - The game id to remove.

    • addPlayerConnector

      public static final void addPlayerConnector(AbstractPlayerConnector playerConnector) throws NullPlayerConnector, DuplicatePlayerNameException
      Add player link to the pool.
      Parameters:
      playerConnector - The connector object to be linked with a player.
      Throws:
      NullPlayerConnector - On null Player connector.
      DuplicatePlayerNameException - On duplicate player name.

    • removePlayerByGame

      public static final void removePlayerByGame(UUID gameId, Player player)
      Remove a player connector from the pool. This closes the socket connection.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The game id reference.
      player - The player to remove.

      public static GameHandler getGameHandlerByUUID(UUID gameId) throws NullGameHandlerInstance
      Finds a game handler in the game pool by its game id.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the UUID to search for
      Returns:
      the GameHandler, if found
      Throws:
      NullGameHandlerInstance - If the game handler is null. If game handler with that id is not found.
